desc: THE MIRACLE OF SOAP: A BETTER WAY TO DONATE Donate through the SapoCycle Donate store; help reduce waste, create jobs for disabled adults and support sanitary & hygiene conditions for communities and families in need.

layout.text: SapoCycle collects discarded soaps in hotels and turns them into life-saving products. Our Hüüsli soaps are refashioned by people with disabilities, then distributed to improve sanitary conditions of families in need.
Support SapoCycle with a donation of CHF10 / €10 or more and receive one of our Iconic Hüüsli soaps as Thank-you gift.
